pages.title: Easy Villagers - Basics
pages.text: Easy villager adds new items that you can use to farm and to get enchatment. $(br2)It also adds an icon on villagers interface to change villager trades.$(br2) Here you can see every recipe for Easy Villagers.

pages.title: Easy Villagers - Recipes
pages.text: This is the last recipe for Easy Villagers itself, but there is an addon for easy villagers so keep reading.

pages.title: Easy Piglins
pages.text: Easy Piglins is an addon to Easy Villagers that allows you to apply the same trading mechanics of Easy Villagers to piglins. Instead of using a trader you need to use a Barterer
